titleStmt.title: Emerai par emeras, Extraordinary dayes, or, Sermons on the most solemn Feasts and fasts throughout the year viz. Christmas-day, Ash-Wednesday, Good Friday, Easter-day, Ascention-day, Whit-Sunday : whereunto are added two other sermons / by John Torbuck ...
titleStmt.author: Torbuck, John, d. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
